import "./Post.scss"; import { Users } from "../../DummyData.js"; function Post({ post }) { const user = Users.filter((u) => u.userId === 1); console.log(user); return (
{post?.date} minutes ago
{/* */}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
